name: Pokemon evolution by Lattensepp (Papaplatte)
description:
A beautiful pixelart which was created by the streamer Lattensepp (Papaplatte). It shows in several sections divided the different Pokemon generations.

Lattensepp had at his Pokemon streams with the German Twitch Streamer BastiGHG rather less viewers compared to currently why he is trying to inspire the audience for the next pokemon seasion.

Pokemon games from left to right:
1. Red / Green / Blue / Yellow
2. Gold / Silver / Crystal
3. Ruby / Sapphire / Emerald
4. Fire Red / Leaf Green
5. Diamond / Pearl / Platinum
6. Heart Gold / Soul Silver
7. Black / White / Black 2 / White 2
